parameters.jsonBody: ={{ {webhookUrl: ($vars.N8N_WEBHOOK_URL || '') + '/webhook/send-reminder', payload: {user_id: $json.user_id, content: $json.content, reminder: $json.reminder, channel: $json.channel, score: $json.score, reason: $json.reason}, channels: [$json.channel], scheduledTime: $json.scheduled_time} }}

parameters.jsCode: return [{json: {documentation: {name: "Reminder Scheduler", description: "Schedules reminder notifications for optimal posting times", input: {recommendations: "Array of time recommendations from Reminder Engine", user_id: "User identifier", content: "Content to remind about"}, output: {reminders_scheduled: "Number of reminders scheduled", scheduled_reminders: "Array of scheduled reminder details"}, required_variables: ["SCHEDULER_URL", "N8N_WEBHOOK_URL", "SUPABASE_URL", "SUPABASE_ANON_KEY"], dependencies: ["Scheduler Service (port 3001)"]}}}]
